utilities

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.Message
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Message.java - This class contains all of the possible message types that can be sent back and forth between the client and the server.
    Author:
    Iliya Kiritchkov
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        messageType - type of message to be sent
        messageContent - contents of the message
